pages.text: Beyond the Horizon mod pack includes tools that make building easier and faster than ever. $(br2)With Building Wands and Building Gadgets, you can construct large structures easily!
Craft a basic Building Wand. It allows you to place multiple blocks at once.
Craft the Gadget Building or Gadget Exchanging tools to place or replace blocks efficiently. $(br2)Use the Destruction Gadget to clear out large areas quickly.
Combine these tools with the Copy-Paste Gadget for replicating complex structures, or use the Template Manager to store your designs. $(br2)Building has never been easier!
